radiographic_examinations.findings: Widespread and distinct soft masses (fat density) in the subcutaneous layer of the neck region.
Excessive fat deposition in the mandible and elbows. There were also large tophi with joint destruction affecting the small joints of his hands.
9.8 cm left kidney and 10.1 cm right kidney with increased echogenicity in keeping with medical renal disease.
Diffuse hepatic change consistent with alcoholic hepatic fibrosis.
